metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Create multiple PDFs from multiple files
Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Send a document to get signatures from others

subsection_analysis.refined_text: To add a blank page to an existing PDF, open the PDF and then choose Edit > Organize pages > Insert > Blank page.
To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document.
(Windows only) You can also right-click a file in Windows Explorer and select Convert to Adobe PDF.

• Certify a document while leaving portions of it available for form filling, signatures, or comments • Use Acrobat Pro software to enable users of Reader 9 or later to sign with certificate IDs • Use Acrobat Standard or Pro to encrypt a PDF document with a certificate ID to restrict usage such as printing, editing, or copying What if my organization isn’t prepared to set up certificate- based signatures? Consider signing up for Adobe Acrobat Sign online, the leader in e-signatures and web contracting.

• Did you enter the email addresses of clients, agents, and other stakeholders? • Customize Your Message • Have you added a personal touch to the subject and message fields, highlighting key property details? • Create and Share the Link • Did you generate a shareable link and copy it for distribution? • Send the Invitation • Have you sent the email or shared the link through your chosen platform? • Follow Up • Are you tracking who has accessed the document and following up with clients for feedback or next steps? Professional Tip: Highlight Key Details Make sure to emphasize important property details in your message to capture your clients' attention.
